bug.author: GuillaumeDSM
bug.summary: [Trader simulator] StopLoss orders triggered when they shouldn't
bug.description: [32m 2018-07-04 18:38:46,481 INFO TraderSimulator Order creation : BTC/USDT | TraderOrderType.SELL_LIMIT | Price : 6748.88 | Quantity : 1.216638 | Status : OrderStatus.OPEN [32m 2018-07-04 18:38:46,503 INFO TraderSimulator Order creation : BTC/USDT | TraderOrderType.STOP_LOSS | Price : 6412.05 | Quantity : 1.216638 | Status : OrderStatus.OPEN [32m 2018-07-04 18:50:57,812 INFO OrdersManager BTC/USDT StopLossOrder (ID : None) filled on binance at 6412.05 [32m 2018-07-04 18:50:57,813 INFO TraderSimulator BTC/USDT SellLimitOrder at 6748.88 (ID : None) cancelled on binance [37m 2018-07-04 18:50:57,816 DEBUG OrdersManager BTC/USDT SellLimitOrder (ID : None) removed on binance prices of BTC/USDT on binance at this moment: between 6632 and 6709
